meanings.definition: The quality or state of being attractive or pleasing to the eye.
meanings.sent1: Her dress sparkled with prettiness under the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with the prettiness of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's attempt at wearing a tiny hat added a touch of prettiness to the party.
meanings.sent4: The prettiness of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The prettiness of the snow-covered landscape was truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being delicate or dainty in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The ballerina moved with a graceful prettiness that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: The delicate prettiness of the lace curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The tiny teacup pig trotted around with a comical prettiness that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a prettiness to it that was as soothing as a lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The prettiness of the fragile porcelain vase made it a cherished family heirloom.
